awardCriteriaBreakdown.title: Award criteria breakdown
awardCriteriaBreakdown.description: All sets of award criteria for the procurement procedure or lots.

AwardCriteria.title: Award criteria
AwardCriteria.description: Information about the award criteria. This information may differ per lot.

relatedLots.title: Related lot(s)
relatedLots.description: Identifiers of one or more lots, to which these criteria apply. If not set, the criteria apply to all lots.

weightingDescription.title: Complicated weighting description
weightingDescription.description: When the weighting cannot be expressed per criterion, the mathematical equation (or other description) that expresses the complicated (e.g. non-linear) weighting.

orderJustification.title: Justification for order of importance
orderJustification.description: The justification for only indicating the award criteria's order of importance, not their weighting.

awardCriteria.title: Award criteria
awardCriteria.description: The award criteria that apply to the related lot(s).

type.title: Type
type.description: The aspect of the bid that the criterion concerns. It uses the open awardCriterionType codelist.

AwardCriterionNumber.title: Award criterion number
AwardCriterionNumber.description: Information about a number linked to an award criterion.

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: Whether the number is a type of weight.

fixed.title: Fixed
fixed.description: Whether the number is a fixed value.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Whether the number is a type of threshold.
